reuters.title: GERMAN CAPITAL ACCOUNT IN DEFICIT IN FEBRUARY
reuters.body: West Germany recorded a net outflow of 7.53 billion marks on the February capital account, combining long and short term capital flows, compared with a net inflow of 11.91 billion marks in January, the Bundesbank said. This compared with a net outflow of 3.51 billion marks in February 1986, the Bundesbank said. REUTER 
